section.title: Interaction Service Server
section.para: The Interaction Service Server is a web application that hosts the web services to support Interaction Services. An example Interaction Service Server may be downloaded from the Taverna Utilities section of the Taverna download page.

section.title: Setup
section.para: The zip file containing the Interaction Service Server should be downloaded and un-zipped. It is necessary to edit the web.xml file within the WEB-INF subdirectory. Details of what and how to change are given in the readme.html file. Once web.xml has been configured then the Interaction Service Server can be deployed within a web environment, for example Apache Tomcat.
